statusHistory.reason: The crew disbanded after their defeat by the Roger Pirates

keyMoments.title: Naguri Pirates' Defeat by Roger
keyMoments.description: Naguri reveals that his crew fought against the Roger Pirates and were easily defeated. The crew eventually disbanded after suffering major damage.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the history of the Naguri Pirates and their connection to Gol D. Roger.

rivalries.description: The Naguri Pirates fought against the Roger Pirates and were defeated.

description: A pirate crew led by Captain Naguri that operated in the past. They fought against Gol D. Roger and the Roger Pirates but were easily defeated. After their captain offered his life to Roger in exchange for his crew's safety, Roger spared them and walked away. The crew suffered major damage and eventually disbanded.
